item.description:
Join us at Carson Beach for outdoor SoJust fun. We'll be there until after 1pm, so stop by anytime. We'll have SoJust signs so you can find us. We'll be the gaggle of folks having fun and wearing nametags!

Look no further if you're seeking like-minded folks to share a beach blanket with, want to cross-promote your events and campaigns while splashing around in the water, or are new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in. If you want to build a strong cross-issue social justice movement, SoJust is for you!

Want to connect outside of SoJust events? Members can view and post events, job & volunteer announcements, roommate searches, etc. on the 'Message Board' and are encouraged to suggest and co-host events.

Wanna know more about SoJust? Check out our Frequently Asked Questions and Event Photos. Learn about our Suggested Annual Membership Fee.

DIRECTIONS:
* Subway: Take the Red Line to JFK/UMass. Exit the station to your right. Take the second exit of the rotary (or go straight through) and walk towards the beach.
* Public Parking: Free public parking is available.
* Bus: Take MBTA Route 5, 8, 11, 16, or 41.
item.name: Beaching for Justice
